devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley

burnTokens(uint256).details: Only callable by the ProjectRegistry contract

calculateWeightOfAddress(address).return: The relative weight of a staker as a whole integer

freezeContract().details: Freezes the contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

init(address,address,address).details: Quasi constructor is called after contract is deployed, must be called with distributeToken, projectRegistry, and plcrVoting intialized to 0

proposeProject(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Calls ProjectRegistry.createProject to finalize transaction and emits ProjectCreated event

params._stakingPeriod: Length of time the project can be staked on before it expires

refundProposer(address).details: token proposer types are denoted by '1' and reputation proposers by '2'

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

revertWei(uint256).details: Only callable by the ProjectRegistry contract

params._value: Amount of wei to transfer to the distributeToken contract

stakeTokens(address,uint256).details: Prevents over staking and returns any excess tokens staked.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unfreezeContract().details: Unfreezes the contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

unstakeTokens(address,uint256).details: Require tokens unstaked is greater than 0

updateDistributeToken(address).details: Update the address of the distributeToken

params._newDistributeToken: Address of the new distribute token

updatePLCRVoting(address).details: Instantiate a new instance of plcrVoting contract

params._newPlcrVoting: Address of the new plcr contract

updateProjectRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the base product proxy contract

params._newProjectRegistry: Address of the new project contract

validateTask(address,uint256,bool).details: Requires the token balance of msg.sender to be greater than the reputationVal of the task

params._prevPollID: The nonce of the previous poll. This is stored off chain
params._secretHash: Secret Hash of voter choice and salt

devdoc.title: This contract serves as the interface through which users propose projects, stake tokens, come to consensus around tasks, validate projects, vote on projects, refund their stakes, and claim their rewards.

burnTokens(uint256).notice: Burn tokens in event of project failure

calculateWeightOfAddress(address).notice: Calculates the relative weight of an `_address`. Weighting is calculated by the proportional amount of tokens a user possess in relation to the total supply.

proposeProject(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Propose a project of cost `_cost` with staking period `_stakingPeriod` and hash `_ipfsHash`, with tokens.

refundProposer(address).notice: Refund a token proposer upon proposal success, transfer 5% of the project cost in wei as a reward along with any tokens staked on the project.

refundStaker(address).notice: Refund a token staker from project at `_projectAddress`

refundVotingTokens(uint256).notice: Refunds staked tokens, thus also withdrawing voting rights from PLCR Contract

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

rescueTokens(address,uint256).notice: Rescue unrevealed token votes from expired polls of task at `_index` of project at `_projectAddress`

revertWei(uint256).notice: Return wei from project balance if task fails

rewardOriginator(address).notice: Rewards the originator of a project plan in tokens.

rewardValidator(address,uint256).notice: Reward the validator of a task if they have been determined to have validated correctly.

validateTask(address,uint256,bool).notice: Validate a task at index `_index` from project at `_projectAddress` with `_tokens` tokens for validation state `_validationState`

voteCommit(address,uint256,uint256,bytes.notice: First part of voting process. Commits a vote using tokens to task at index `_index` of project at `projectAddress` for tokens `_tokens`. Submits a secrect hash `_secretHash`, which is a tightly packed hash of the voters choice and their salt

voteReveal(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Second part of voting process. Reveal existing vote.

userdoc.notice: This contract implements how users perform actions using capital tokens in the various stages of a project.
